name: Adore's Antiques
description:
More information coming shortly!

WASD/ZQSD/Arrow Keys to move
Spacebar/Return Key for Action button

There's a slight bug after the intro cutscene that can occur.. if the screen goes all black or all white, just hit the action key. It's something where the first text appears too early.

Also, the game runs best in Chrome. You may experience some audio stuttering in Firefox.
